an5.294-302:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato nigantho … mundasavako … jatilako … paribbajako … magandiko … tedandiko … aruddhako … gotamako … devadhammiko yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an5.294-302:1.3: Panatipati hoti, adinnadayi hoti …pe… suramerayamajjapamadatthayi hoti.
an5.294-302:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato devadhammiko yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye”ti.
